        public Item(int id,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
            Game game,
            Citys cityClass,
            java.lang.String description)
        Defult constructor for all subclasses. Sets the default class variables.
        Parameters:
        id - the id number for the item.
        name - the name of the item.
        image - the image of the item.
        game - the game object containing all the objects and variables in the game.
        cityClass - the object containing the array of City objects.
        description - the written description of the item.
